name: Antiterror Strike
description:
Antiterror Strike is a Tactical First Person Shooter, where you play as a member of an elite special force, tasked with fighting terrorist groups in the city. Complete missions, storm the houses with terrorists with them and then defend it after enemy waves. After every mission you get a money reward, on which you can buy different weapons and armor upgrade.

Hardcore Fps gameplay with tactical combat.
Modern graphics
You can buy different weapons and equipment.
